title: Ticket #6378: Milestone 3 for schedd late materialization
description:
Enhancements to late materialization for 8.7.4

  1. keep count of Materialized, Idle, Running and Held jobs in schedd's cluster object.

  2. add more flexible policy for controlling whether jobs materialize or not.

  3. Load foreach data into memory only when needed, don't keep it around after we are done with it.

  4. report materialize failures in the user log.

  5. Add a job factory submit/remove log event.

  6. Make it possible to pause/resume the factory using a tool.
remarks:
2017-Oct-18 10:25:57 by johnkn:
items 1 & 5 were completed in this release. Item 6 is partially complete (condor_hold <cluster-id> pauses the factory as well as materialized jobs). The other items will be pushed forward to the next release.
